description: Product Description Lighters Our Lighters - Multipack Assorted Colour Lighters with Adjustable Flame Light - Better than long matches, Read all warnings before using this product. - Will dispatch with Random Colours. Key Features - Adjustable Flame - Reliable - Easy to use - Transparent Disposable Disposable lighters, use once finished dispose and get another from the pack. Multipack Multipacks available from: - 25 Pack - 50 Pack Lighters Dimensions Dimensions - 10 x 4 x 2 cm Transparent These lighters are transparent so you can see the fuel level. Adjustable Flame Allows you to take control on how high or low you would like the flame to be. Usage / Troubleshooting Within the lighter there are two fuel chambers, to view a full chamber rotate the item from left to right. Please ensure this item is not dropped on the floor as it could cause damage to the internal components and cause the item to stop working.
